translation: By that same former practice, he is borne on in spite of himself. Even he who merely wishes to know Yoga goes beyond the Brahmanic word.
commentary: 6.44 By former practice former practice? by that by that? Eve verily? Hriyate is borne? Hi indeed? Of course helpless? Even even? He he? Curious: he who wishes to know Yoga? Even even? of Yoga of Yoga? ShabdaBrahman wordBrahman? Ativartate goes beyond.Commentary Is the man who fell from Yoga carried to the goal which he intended to reach in his previous birth? by the force of the Samskaras of the practice of Yoga though
